name: ✦KAKASHI-xᴅ✦
description: Javascript WhatsApp bot made by BLACK-HAWK TEAM ᴛᴇᴄʜ🪀

MENU_IMG.description: paste your image url if you don't have you can use this public url.

ALIVE_IMG.description: paste your image url if you don't have you can use this public url.

LIVE_MSG.value: > ✦KAKASHI-XD✦ CHAKRA IS FULL AND KAKASHI IS ALIVE🗡️㊙️

PREFIX.description: paste your bot prefix note! Don't apply null prefix.

MODE.description: select your bot work type public-private-inbox-group.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if want kakashi to always be online.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Make it true if want kakashi to automatic voice reply .

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want kakashi to automatic reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true if you want kakashi to automatic send sticker.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true if you want kakashi to automatically view status.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want kakashi to automatically replie ur contacts status.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message on status reply

OWNER_NUMBER.description: put the kakashis owner number plis don't enclude +sign.

ANTI_LINK.description: Make it true if you want bot auto remove group link.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make it true if you want bot auto delete bad words.

DESCRIPTION.description: add caption for menu and other

DELETE_LINKS.description: remove links from group automatically without removing member

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want auto recoding.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true if you want auto typing.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true if you want react on every message.

OWNER_REACT.description: Make it true if you only want react on Owner Massages.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Make it true if you want custom reactions.

CUSTOM_REACT_EMOJIS.description: put here custom react react emojis.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make it true if you want kakashi bot to read all sms instantly.
